questions.title: Find the Square of a Number
questions.description: Write a function that takes a number as input and returns its square.

questions.title: Check if a Number is Even
questions.description: Write a function that takes an integer as input and returns true if it's even, false otherwise.

questions.title: Calculate the Factorial of a Number
questions.description: Write a function that calculates the factorial of a given positive integer.

questions.title: Reverse a String
questions.description: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns its reverse.

questions.title: Check for Palindrome
questions.description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome.
